name: Gambler's Earrings
title: Wager: Gambler's Earrings
desc: "In games where one gambles with life and death, remaining calm and composed is key to increasing one's odds of victory."
in_play_description: After an opposing character is defeated: If the character this card is attached to is the active character, create Omni Element ×2. (Can happen 3 times per match)

skills.desc:
After an opposing character is defeated: If the character this card is attached to is the active character, create Omni Element ×2. (Can happen 3 times per match)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
